column4: i have installed 9.04 and how do i install the nvidia drivers ?
is there a way to do it ?
it says there is no propreitory hardware drivers running
and is your nvidia card listed ?
it shows nothing in that box though the nvidia drivers work perfectly with 8.10
its not listed in that box
dunno what's happening... you can follow the manual steps listed on the web page
can i install the nvidia 180x version in synaptic?
i used to delete it in the older versions in /etc/event.d so now i have to do the same in /etc/init
the tty files are there for you to remove/move them
